description.value: Whether you're dodging shifting asteroids or emergent solar flares, exploring an undiscovered star system, or flying through a dangerous nebula, you're a star-faring pilot at the forefront of galactic exploration. You always count a success as a critical success when using Piloting to @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.hsUKPqTdAvWwsqH2]{Navigate} or @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.LXqcXRayK58inaKo]{Plot Course}, and you reduce the travel time it takes to fly to a destination by one day plus one day for every four days of travel (minimum 1).
